title: Record number of parents miss work as respiratory illnesses spike in kids
description: Though there are signs things could get worse, the White House has a rosy outlook.

title: New test shows loose RTX 4090 power connectors cause overheating and melting
description: Failure is rare, but can be caused by any kind of 12VHPWR cable or adapter.

title: Nvidia and Microsoft team up to build massive AI cloud computer
description: AI supercomputer will use "tens of thousands" of Nvidia A100 and H100 GPUs.

title: Amazon begins layoffs of up to 10,000 jobs, blames “uncertain” economy
description: Amazon confirms Devices & Services layoffs; warehouse jobs apparently safe.

title: A cosmic hourglass: Webb captures image of protostar swathed in dark clouds
description: New image offers window into what our Sun and Solar System looked like in infancy.

title: What’s the deal with Formula 1 and sustainable fuels?
description: F1's CTO, Pat Symonds, explains the sport's plans to be carbon neutral by 2030.

title: Netflix gives account holders the ability to kick freeloaders
description: It's about password sharing, sure, but security, too.

title: DuckDuckGo’s Android anti-tracking tool offers stronger third-party protections
description: App Tracking Protection blocks outbound traffic to listed tracking firms.

title: Measles outbreak jumps to 7 Ohio daycares, 1 school—all with unvaccinated kids
description: The highly contagious virus is spreading amid slipping vaccination rates.

title: Razer doubles its latest Blade laptop’s USB speeds with a firmware update
description: New update lights up functionality present in all of AMD's Ryzen 6000 CPUs.

title: How the PS5’s DualSense controller is failing disabled players
description: Two years after PS5 launch, Sony doesn't offer accessible-control alternatives.

title: Laser-driven fusion’s internal energies not matching up with predictions
description: There's a change in behavior when the plasma starts burning, and nobody knows why.

title: City birds are changing their tune
description: Many urban-dwelling birds have modified their songs in response to human-generated noise.

title: Musk tells Twitter staff: Agree to work “long hours at high intensity” or quit now
description: Musk's all-staff email: "Click yes on the link below" to keep your job.

title: ISP deploys fiber service with a wrinkle—the users themselves own each network
description: Despite costly Silicon Valley project, CEO says this isn't just for wealthy areas.

title: NASA gets its mojo back with a stunning nighttime launch of the SLS rocket
description: The US space agency had not launched an orbital rocket since 2011.
